alert.note: Alert for Angelina; Houston; Polk; Trinity; Tyler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 26 at 5:21AM CDT until March 28 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Shreveport LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following river in Texas... Neches River Near Diboll affecting Tyler, Houston, Angelina, Polk and Trinity Counties. For the Neches River...including Diboll...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Neches River Near Diboll, Texas. * WHEN...From this Saturday evening to early Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12 feet, Minor lowland flooding occurs. Expect flooded boat ramps and trails. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 11.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this Saturday evening to a crest of 12.1 feet by early Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 12 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Sunday morning at 700 AM CDT.
